data.inputDescription: an integer [[n]]: the number of iterations
data.outputDescription:
the tree

example :
[[n]]=4
A
AB <=("AB" from the A)
ABA  <=("AB" from A and "A" from B)
ABAAB <=("AB" from A, "A" from B, and "AB" from the last A)

lastVersion.statementHTML:
Goal

Its's time to create a big tree!
For this, use the L system like this:
(begin with the letter "A")
if you have an "A", return "AB" (A=>AB)
if you have "B", return "A" (B=>A)
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
A --> AB
B --> A
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Input
an integer n: the number of iterations
Output
the tree

example :
n=4
A
AB <=("AB" from the A)
ABA <=("AB" from A and "A" from B)
ABAAB <=("AB" from A, "A" from B, and "AB" from the last A)
Constraints
20>n>0
and n ∈ ℕ .
Example
Input
1
Output
A
